DOC.brief_summary: Three clinical group evaluate . Each group patient undergo one method Resin Composite application ( multi-layer technique 'control group ' - bulk-fill Technique - Sonicfill technique ) . The restored teeth followed-up till one year . A comparison go make three group relation modify United Sates Public Health Service ( USPHS ) criteria good restoration .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Two Different Methods Resin Composite Application In Class II Restorations
DOC.detailed_description: The modify USPHS criterion include evaluation seven characteristic restoration : color match , marginal integrity , surface texture , wear restoration antagonist , recurrent dental caries , fracture detachment , gingivitis around abutment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Cooperated patient . 2 . Good general health . 3 . Good oral hygiene . 4 . Aged 15 60 year . 5 . Class II restoration ( upper low ) 6 . Full erupt teeth . 7 . Caries value D3 D4 accord Daignodent . 1 . If caries value accord Daignodent le D3 D4 . 2 . If tooth partially erupt . 3 . Class II boxlike cavity without extension . 4 .
